location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP No. 5 to illustrate operations in the Akaika Channel 27th. June to 5th. July 1915'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 152 x 150mm, on sheet 255 x 211mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume I, and shows a region around Akaika in south-eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, towns, settlements and vegetation. Rivers and lakes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in June 1922.
